name: Another Unnecessarily Creative Platformer
description:
Here it is! My completed 2d platformer. I wanted to do a lot more, but it's been a bit of a stressful week. I hope you  like my project, though!

Modifications (please read after that too, though!)

New music track composed by Farhan Parekh (aka me), a new level 3, Complete player overhaul, including new sprites, completed animations for every action (idle, running, jumping, dying), 'lives' UI element overhaul, also, new voice lines! (for getting hit and for dying), completely new tileset for level 1.

level 1: find the key and make your way to the door! If you don't move, lav might stomp to the music :) make sure to check out the voice lines!

level 2: We're in space! Gravity is low. fall down the column and move left and right to avoid the traps. You have unlimited jumps! Make the most of them

level 3: a..normal level? sure, you could call it that. But see if you can finish the level without jumping! You'd be surprised ;)

Credits: Lavender character, splash art, UI, sprites, animations and sound effects created by Farhan Parekh

'Soil' tileset created by Farhan Parekh

song used that weren't mine: provided music, as well as 'Fluffing a Duck', by Kevin Macleod.
